line.comment: * Task 0.
* This fleet is the only one that can claim and conquer sectors.
* Does not conquer Protectorates.
* Does not conquer Xenon sectors.
* Does not conquer Unknown sectors while the player has not captured one sector (check 'mayhem_galaxy.progress': becomes one when first sector is conquered).
* Does not conquer a sector if the owner has no more than 2 sectors.
* Needs Ad. Sat coverage.
* Conquers Dejure sectors in priority, then look for the most valuable sector.
* If the starting option "deep strike" is on, Battle Groups are not limited to border sectors.
* To conquer a sector, all stations of the owner must be destroyed. Other stations are left intact.
* When a sector is targetted (Ad.Sat check), the Battle Group goes to the nearest [OWNER] sector, THEN if its force is stronger (Ad.Sat check), it claims the sector and go there to conquer it...
* ... if it's not strong enough, it looks for other sectors.
* Other Battle Groups will reinforce already claimed sectors if the hostile ships are too strong (ie. initiative is not in favour of on-site Battle Groups anymore).
* Target priority: Huge Ships, Big Ships, Factories, Outpost.
* do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.Squadron.SwitchLeaderIfNeeded' : squadron=[THIS]
* continue
* SWM3 coordinated invasion
* preparation phase
* attack phase
* Attack enemies in current sector if we are claiming it.
* pure fighter Battlegroups first try to get rid of other fighters but at shorter distance.
* Huge ships.
* Big ships.
* Factories.
* Outpost.
* Pirate base.
* Conquering is managed in !station.signal.killed (and Mayhem.Claim).
* But we make sure, because in some cases, it won't work.
* Sort sectors by [OWNER] claimed sectors in need, dejure and value.
* Do our other Battle Groups need a hand?
* Reinforcements if buddies are not strong enough.
* Getting more aggressive from Yaki stage.
* Prioritize Xenon and Unknown sectors.
* Look for the nearest safe sector to prepare for attack.
* Attack enemy sector.
* if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.Squadron.IsStrongEnoughAgainstSector' : squadron=[THIS] sector=$claimableSector
* SWM3 lowered war motivation from NPC Battlegroup invading an already claimed player sector
* If there's no station, we move to the sector before claiming it (and potentially conquering it).
* SWM3 lowered war motivation from NPC Battlegroup first claiming a player sector
* end

sval.val: This fleet is the only one that can claim and conquer sectors.
Does not conquer Unknown sectors while the player has not captured one sector (check 'mayhem_galaxy.progress': becomes one when first sector is conquered).
Does not conquer a sector if the owner has no more than 2 sectors.
Conquers Dejure sectors in priority, then look for the most valuable sector.
If the starting option "deep strike" is on, Battle Groups are not limited to border sectors.
To conquer a sector, all stations of the owner must be destroyed. Other stations are left intact.
When a sector is targetted (Ad.Sat check), the Battle Group goes to the nearest [OWNER] sector, THEN if its force is stronger (Ad.Sat check), it claims the sector and go there to conquer it...
... if it's not strong enough, it looks for other sectors.
Other Battle Groups will reinforce already claimed sectors if the hostile ships are too strong (ie. initiative is not in favour of on-site Battle Groups anymore).
Target priority: Huge Ships, Big Ships, Factories, Outpost.
Attack enemies in current sector if we are claiming it.
pure fighter Battlegroups first try to get rid of other fighters but at shorter distance.
But we make sure, because in some cases, it won't work.
Sort sectors by [OWNER] claimed sectors in need, dejure and value.
Do our other Battle Groups need a hand?
Reinforcements if buddies are not strong enough.
Getting more aggressive from Yaki stage.
Look for the nearest safe sector to prepare for attack.
SWM3 lowered war motivation from NPC Battlegroup invading an already claimed player sector
If there's no station, we move to the sector before claiming it (and potentially conquering it).
SWM3 lowered war motivation from NPC Battlegroup first claiming a player sector
